channel.title: Client for Mac
channel.description:
Does any1 know how to get a client working for mac?
I know it is possible bc i have seen pics from ry.
please dont tell me its impossible.
Please help
-Delic

/usr/bin/type: line 4: type: EGUI: not found

[Process completed]

what does that mean

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2008, 06:05:52 pm[/size][hr]Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI

[Process completed]

accidentally inclueded “type” in the last post,

what does that mean[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2008, 11:44:44 pm[/size][hr]HELP!!!

item.title: Client for Mac
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“delicious, post:12, topic:250142”]lol, how do i do that?[/quote]You’re joking right?

If you aren’t…

  1. Open a command line
  2. type java -Xmx500m EGUI
  3. Press ENTER
  4. GO to moparisthebest.com

item.title: Client for Mac
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

RXVL:

Thats a .bat file your trying to run, which is ment for WINDOWS. Your “friend” has to make a .jar file.

He made a jar file…

delicious, just run this from the command line:
java -Xmx500m EGUI
You could put it in a shell script if you like.

Read full topic

item.title: Client for Mac
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

[quote=“delicious, post:9, topic:250142”]Ok, so i downloaded the moparscape client. Opened the .JAR and it opened.
I downloaded my friends client, and tried to open the .JAR and it wouldnt open.
I opened both with text edit, and i could open my friends, and it looked like a normal run file, u kno:

@ECHO OFF
color 77
title RSREV CLIENT V3 LAST CLIENT!! ENJOY!!!
echo RUNNING RSREV CLIENT V3 LAST CLIENT HAVE FUN!
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI

Then i tried to open the Moparscape.JAR with textedit, and it said it was not in the right format. So please help me get my friends client to work on mac, Moparscape’s client does.[/quote]

Lol.

Thats a .bat file your trying to run, which is ment for WINDOWS. Your “friend” has to make a .jar file.

Read full topic

item.title: Client for Mac
item.dc:creator: @delicious delicious
item.description:
@delicious wrote:

Ok, so i downloaded the moparscape client. Opened the .JAR and it opened.
I downloaded my friends client, and tried to open the .JAR and it wouldnt open.
I opened both with text edit, and i could open my friends, and it looked like a normal run file, u kno:

@ECHO OFF
color 77
title RSREV CLIENT V3 LAST CLIENT!! ENJOY!!!
echo RUNNING RSREV CLIENT V3 LAST CLIENT HAVE FUN!
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI

Then i tried to open the Moparscape.JAR with textedit, and it said it was not in the right format. So please help me get my friends client to work on mac, Moparscape’s client does.

Read full topic

item.title: Client for Mac
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I posted the entire process. Open client.java, change “127.0.0.1” to world27.blahblahblah, change one of the 50000’s to 443, and one of the 40000’s to 43594. go to terminal, cd to the directory, javac *.java, then do java client 27 live english game1.

Read full topic

item.title: Client for Mac
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

change some ints around in the client(cba to post which ones), change 127.0.0.1 to “world57.runescape.com”, go to terminal, go to the directory that has the class files, javac *.java, type “java client 57 live english game1”,
